trans-unit.source: This website is powered by PeerTube
PeerTube is a self-hosted ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser.
trans-unit.target: PeerTube je ActivityPub-federalizirana platforma za prijenos videa s vlastitom uslugom za hosting koja koristi P2P izravno u tvom web-pregledniku.

trans-unit.source: It is free and open-source software, under AGPLv3 licence.
trans-unit.target: Slobodni softver otvorenog koda, licenziran pod AGPLv3.

trans-unit.source: For more information, please visit joinpeertube.org.
trans-unit.target: Za više informacija posjeti stranicu joinpeertube.org.

trans-unit.source: Discover how to setup your account, what is a channel, how to create a playlist and more!
trans-unit.target: Otkrij kako postaviti račun, što je kanal, kako izraditi playlistu i još više!

trans-unit.source: Discover unofficial Android applications or browser addons!
trans-unit.target: Otkrij neslužbene Android aplikacije i dodatke za preglednik!

trans-unit.source: Want to help to improve PeerTube? You can translate the web interface, give your feedback or directly contribute to the code!
trans-unit.target: Želiš pomoći poboljšati PeerTube? Prevedi web-sučelje, pošalji povratne informacije ili izravno doprinesi kodu!

trans-unit.source: PeerTube uses the BitTorrent protocol to share bandwidth between users by default to help lower the load on the server, but ultimately leaves you the choice to switch back to regular streaming exclusively from the server of the video. What follows applies only if you want to keep using the P2P mode of PeerTube.
trans-unit.target: PeerTube standardno koristi BitTorrent protokol za dijeljenje propusnosti između korisnika kako bi se smanjilo opterećenje poslužitelja, ali ti u konačnici ostavlja izbor da se vratiš na regularni prijenos isključivo s poslužitelja videa. Ono što slijedi vrijedi samo ako želiš nastaviti koristiti P2P modus PeerTubea.

trans-unit.source: The main threat to your privacy induced by BitTorrent lies in your IP address being stored in the instance's BitTorrent tracker as long as you download or watch the video.
trans-unit.target: Glavna prijetnja za tvoju privatnost izazvana BitTorrentom je spremanje tvoje IP adrese u BitTorrent alatu za praćenje instance, dok preuzimaš ili gledaš video.

trans-unit.source: In theory, someone with enough technical skills could create a script that tracks which IP is downloading which video. In practice, this is much more difficult because:
trans-unit.target: U teoriji, netko s dovoljno tehničkih vještina mogao bi izraditi skript koji prati koja IP adresa preuzima koji video. U praksi je to puno teže jer:

trans-unit.source: An HTTP request has to be sent on each tracker for each video to spy. If we want to spy all PeerTube's videos, we have to send as many requests as there are videos (so potentially a lot)
trans-unit.target: HTTP zahtjev se mora poslati na svakom alatu za praćenje za svaki špijunirani video. Ako želimo špijunirati sva PeerTubeova videa, moramo poslati onoliko zahtjeva koliko ima videa (dakle potencijalno puno)

trans-unit.source: For each request sent, the tracker returns random peers at a limited number. For instance, if there are 1000 peers in the swarm and the tracker sends only 20 peers for each request, there must be at least 50 requests sent to know every peer in the swarm
trans-unit.target: Za svaki poslani zahtjev, alat a praćenje vraća ograničen broj slučajno odabranih sudionika. Na primjer, ako postoji 1.000 sudionika u gomili i alat a praćenje šalje samo 20 sudionika za svaki zahtjev, mora se poslati najmanje 50 zahtjeva da bi se poznao svaki sudionik u gomili

trans-unit.source: Those requests have to be sent regularly to know who starts/stops watching a video. It is easy to detect that kind of behaviour
trans-unit.target: Ti se zahtjevi moraju redovito slati kako bi se znalo tko počinje/prestaje gledati video. Lako je otkriti takvo ponašanje

trans-unit.source: If an IP address is stored in the tracker, it doesn't mean that the person behind the IP (if this person exists) has watched the video
trans-unit.target: Ako je IP adresa spremljena u alatu za praćenje, to ne znači da je osoba tog IP-a (ako ta osoba postoji) pogledala video

trans-unit.source: The IP address is a vague information: usually, it regularly changes and can represent many persons or entities
trans-unit.target: IP adresa je nejasna informacija: obično se redovito mijenja i može predstavljati mnoge osobe ili entitete

trans-unit.source: Web peers are not publicly accessible: because we use the websocket transport, the protocol is different from classic BitTorrent tracker. When you are in a web browser, you send a signal containing your IP address to the tracker that will randomly choose other peers to forward the information to. See this document for more information
trans-unit.target: Web sudionici nisu javno dostupni: budući da koristimo websocket transport, protokol se razlikuje od klasičnog BitTorrent trackera. Kad se nalaziš u web-pregledniku, šalješ signal koji sadrži tvoju IP adresu alatu za praćenje koji će nasumično odabrati druge korisnike kojima će proslijediti informacije. Pogledaj ovaj dokument za više informacija

trans-unit.source: The worst-case scenario of an average person spying on their friends is quite unlikely. There are much more effective ways to get that kind of information.
trans-unit.target: Najgori mogući scenarij prosječne osobe da špijunira svoje prijatelje je malo vjerojatno. Postoje puno učinkovitiji načini za dobivanje te vrste informacije.

trans-unit.source: How does PeerTube compare with YouTube?
trans-unit.target: Kakav je PeerTube u usporedbi s YouTubeom?

trans-unit.source: The threats to privacy with YouTube are different from PeerTube's. In YouTube's case, the platform gathers a huge amount of your personal information (not only your IP) to analyze them and track you. Moreover, YouTube is owned by Google/Alphabet, a company that tracks you across many websites (via AdSense or Google Analytics).
trans-unit.target: Prijetnje privatnosti na YouTubeu razlikuju se od PeerTube prijetnji. U slučaju YouTubea, platforma prikuplja ogromnu količinu tvojih osobnih podataka (ne samo tvoj IP) kako bi ih analizirala i kako bi te pratila. Štoviše, YouTube je u vlasništvu Google/Alphabeta, tvrtke koja te prati na mnogim web-stranicama (preko AdSensea ili Google Analyticsa).

trans-unit.source: What can I do to limit the exposure of my IP address?
trans-unit.target: Što mogu učiniti da ograničim izloženost svoje IP adrese?

trans-unit.source: Your IP address is public so every time you consult a website, there is a number of actors (in addition to the final website) seeing your IP in their connection logs: ISP/routers/trackers/CDN and more. PeerTube is transparent about it: we warn you that if you want to keep your IP private, you must use a VPN or Tor Browser. Thinking that removing P2P from PeerTube will give you back anonymity doesn't make sense.
trans-unit.target: Tvoja IP adresa je javna, tako da svaki put kad posjetiš web-stranicu, postoji niz aktera (pored konačne web-stranice) koji vide tvoju IP adresu u svojim zapisima povezivanja: ISP/usmjerivači/alati za praćenje/CDN i više. PeerTube je transparentan u vezi s tim: upozoravamo da ako želiš zadržati privatnost svoje IP adrese, moraš koristiti VPN ili Tor preglednik. Misliti da će ti uklanjanje P2P-a s PeerTubea vratiti anonimnost nema smisla.

trans-unit.source: What will be done to mitigate this problem?
trans-unit.target: Što će se učiniti da se ovaj problem smanji?

trans-unit.source: PeerTube wants to deliver the best countermeasures possible, to give you more choice and render attacks less likely. Here is what we put in place so far:
trans-unit.target: PeerTube želi pružiti najbolje moguće protumjere kako bi pružio više izbora i smanjio vjerojatnost napada. Evo što smo do sada postavili:

trans-unit.source: We set a limit to the number of peers sent by the tracker
trans-unit.target: Postavili smo ograničenje broja sudionika koje šalje alat za praćenje

trans-unit.source: We set a limit on the request frequency received by the tracker
trans-unit.target: Postavili smo ograničenje za učestalost zahtjeva koje prima alat za praćenje

trans-unit.source: Allow instance admins to disable P2P from the administration interface
trans-unit.target: Dopusti administratorima instance da isključe P2P u sučelju administracije

trans-unit.source: Ultimately, remember you can always disable P2P by toggling it in the video player, or just by disabling WebRTC in your browser.
trans-unit.target: U konačnici, zapamti da P2P uvijek možeš isključiti u video playeru ili jednostavno isključi WebRTC u svom pregledniku.

trans-unit.source: Slight modifications to your PeerTube instance for when creating a plugin or theme is overkill.
trans-unit.target: Male izmjene na tvojoj PeerTube instanci kad bi stvaranje dodatka ili teme bilo pretjerano.

trans-unit.source: Write JavaScript code directly.Example: console.log('my instance is amazing');
trans-unit.target: Piši JavaScript kod izravno.Primjer: console.log('moja instanca je nevjerojatna');
Piši CSS kod izravno. Primjer:#custom-css color: red; Dodaj #custom-css za primjenu prilagođenog stila. Primjer:#custom-css .logged-in-email color: red;

trans-unit.source: Use plugins & themes for more involved changes, or add slight customizations.
trans-unit.target: Koristi dodatke i teme za značajnije promjene ili dodaj manjaprilagođavanja.

trans-unit.source: Provide the Twitter account representing your instance to improve link previews. If you don't have a Twitter account, just leave the default value.

trans-unit.source: If your instance is explicitly allowed by Twitter, a video player will be embedded in the Twitter feed on PeerTube video share. If the instance is not, we use an image link card that will redirect to your PeerTube instance. Check this checkbox, save the configuration and test with a video URL of your instance (https://example.com/w/blabla) on https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator to see if you instance is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Ako Twitter izričito dozvoljava tvoju instancu, videoplayer će biti ugrađen u Twitter feed na PeerTube stranici dijeljenja videa. Ako ne, koristimo karticu sa slikovnom poveznicom koja preusmjerava na tvoju PeerTube instancu. Označi ovu opciju, spremi konfiguraciju i testiraj s URL-om videa tvoje instance (https://example.com/w/blabla ) na https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator i ssaznaj je li tvoja instanca dozvoljena.

trans-unit.source: Updating instance configuration from the web interface is disabled by the system administrator.
trans-unit.target: Administrator sustava je isključio aktualiziranje instance s web sučelja.

trans-unit.source: There are errors in the form:
You cannot allow live replay if you don't enable transcoding.
trans-unit.target: Ne možeš dozvoliti reprizu uživo ako ne uključiš transkodiranje.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the server configuration because it's managed externally.
trans-unit.target: Ne možeš promijeniti konfiguraciju poslužitelja jer se njime upravlja izvana.
Glavni jezici kojima ti i tvoji moderatori govorite

trans-unit.source: Manage users to build a moderation team.
trans-unit.target: Upravljaj korisnicima za stvaranje moderacijskog tima.

trans-unit.source: This instance is dedicated to sensitive or NSFW content
trans-unit.target: Ova je instanca namijenjena za neprikladan sadržaj

trans-unit.source: Enabling it will allow other administrators to know that you are mainly federating sensitive content. Moreover, the NSFW checkbox on video upload will be automatically checked by default.
trans-unit.target: Uključivanjem ćeš dozvoliti drugim administratorima da znaju da uglavnom federaliziraš neprikladan sadržaj. Štoviše, opcija za neprikladni sadržaj pri prijenosu videa će se standardno automatski označiti.

trans-unit.source: Policy on videos containing sensitive content
trans-unit.target: Politika za videa koji sadrže neprikladan sadržaj

trans-unit.source: With Hide or Blur thumbnails, a confirmation will be requested to watch the video.
trans-unit.target: Pomoću oznake Sakrij ili Zamuti sličice, zatražit će se potvrda za gledanje videa.

trans-unit.source: Who moderates the instance? What is the policy regarding NSFW videos? Political videos? etc
trans-unit.target: Tko moderira instancu? Kako izgleda politika u vezi s videima neprikladnog sadržaja? Politička videa? itd

trans-unit.source: A single person? A non-profit? A company?
Why did you create this instance?
To share your personal videos? To open registrations and allow people to upload what they want?
trans-unit.target: Za dijeljenje tvojih osobnih videa? Za otvaranje registracije i dozvoljavanje ljudima da prenose što žele?

trans-unit.source: How long do you plan to maintain this instance?
trans-unit.target: Kako dugo planiraš održavati ovu instancu?

trans-unit.source: It's important to know for users who want to register on your instance
trans-unit.target: Ovo je važno za korisnike koji se žele registrirati na tvojoj instanci

trans-unit.source: How will you finance the PeerTube server?
With your own funds? With user donations? Advertising?

i.e. 2vCore 2GB RAM, a direct the link to the server you rent, etc.

trans-unit.source: Small latency disables P2P and high latency can increase P2P ratio

trans-unit.source: Same as VOD transcoding, transcoding live streams so that they are in a streamable form that any device can play. Requires a beefy CPU, and then some.
trans-unit.target: Isto kao transkodiranje videa na zahtjev, transkodira prijenose uživo tako da budu u obliku koji se može reproducirati na bilo kojem uređaju. Zahtijeva moćan procesor i još još više.

trans-unit.source: Use remote runners to process live transcoding. Remote runners has to register on your instance first.
trans-unit.target: Use remote runners to process live transcoding. Remote runners has to register on your instance first.

trans-unit.source: Even if it's above your maximum enabled resolution
trans-unit.target: Čak i ako je veća od tvoje maksimalne rezolucije

trans-unit.source: will claim at most with VOD transcoding
trans-unit.target: trebat će do s transkodiranjem videa na zahtjev

trans-unit.source: will claim at least with VOD transcoding
trans-unit.target: trebat će barem s transkodiranjem videa na zahtjev

trans-unit.source: new live transcoding profiles can be added by PeerTube plugins
trans-unit.target: novi profili za transkodiranje uživo mogu se dodati pomoću PeerTube dodataka

trans-unit.source: Estimating a server's capacity to transcode and stream videos isn't easy and we can't tune PeerTube automatically.
trans-unit.target: Procjenjivanje kapaciteta poslužitelja za transkodiranje i prijenose videa nije laka i ne možemo automatski podesiti PeerTube.

trans-unit.source: However, you may want to read our guidelines before tweaking the following values.
trans-unit.target: U svakom slučaju, predlažemo da pročitaš naše smjernice prije prilagođavanja sljedećih vrijednosti.

trans-unit.source: Process uploaded videos so that they are in a streamable form that any device can play. Though costly in resources, this is a critical part of PeerTube, so tread carefully.
trans-unit.target: Obradi prenesena videa tako da budu u prenosivom obliku te da se mogu reproducirati na svakom uređaj. Iako troši veliku količinu resursa, ovo je kritični dio PeerTubea, stoga koračaj oprezno.

trans-unit.source: Use remote runners to process VOD transcoding. Remote runners has to register on your instance first.
trans-unit.target: Use remote runners to process VOD transcoding. Remote runners has to register on your instance first.

trans-unit.source: The file will be merged in a still image video with the preview file on upload.

trans-unit.source: Requires ffmpeg >= 4.1Generate HLS playlists and fragmented MP4 files resulting in a better playback than with plain WebTorrent:Resolution change is smootherFaster playback especially with long videosMore stable playback (less bugs/infinite loading)If you also enabled WebTorrent support, it will multiply videos storage by 2

trans-unit.source: It's time to configure your instance!
trans-unit.target: Vrijeme je za konfiguriranje tvoje instance!

trans-unit.source: Choosing your instance name, setting up a description, specifying who you are, why you created your instance and how long you plan to maintain it is very important for visitors to understand on what type of instance they are.
trans-unit.target: Biranjem imena tvoje instance, postavljanjem opisa, navođenjem tko si, zašto si stvorio/la svoju instancu i kako dugo je planiraš održavati su važne informacije za posjetitelje kako bi razumjeli na kojoj vrsti instance se nalaze.

trans-unit.source: If you want to open registrations, please decide what your moderation rules and instance terms of service are, as well as specify the categories and languages and your moderators speak. This way, you will help users to register on the appropriate PeerTube instance.
trans-unit.target: Ako želiš otvoriti registracije, odluči koja su tvoja pravila moderiranja i uvjeti usluge instance te odredi kategorije i jezike kojima govore tvoji moderatori. Na taj način pomažeš korisnicima da se registriraju na odgovarajuću PeerTube instancu.
